sentences.sContent: In places, the path can be wet and slippery.
sentences.sCn: 路上有些地方可能又湿又滑。

sentences.sContent: Harry’s palms were slippery with sweat.
sentences.sCn: 哈里手心滑溜溜的都是汗。

sentences.sContent: ...slippery concepts that are rarely thought through...
...This slippery slope of eroding ethics and bigger risks leads only to disaster...

phrases.pCn: n. 灾难性的急剧下滑

trans.tranOther: something that is slippery is difficult to hold, walk on etc because it is wet or  greasy
